00024 #include "cv.hpp"
00025 #include "utility/misc/unit.hpp"
00026 #include <iostream>
00027 
00028 
00029 using namespace pwiz::msdata;
00030 using namespace pwiz::util;
00031 using namespace std;
00032 
00033 
00034 ostream* os_ = 0;
00035 
00036 
00037 void test()
00038 {
00039     if (os_)
00040     {
00041         *os_ << "name: " << cvinfo(MS_sample_number).name << endl
00042              << "def: " << cvinfo(MS_sample_number).def << "\n\n";
00043 
00044         *os_ << "name: " << cvinfo(MS_polarity).name << endl
00045              << "def: " << cvinfo(MS_polarity).def << endl; 
00046     }
00047 
00048     // some simple tests
00049     unit_assert(cvinfo(MS_sample_number).name == "sample number");
00050     unit_assert(cvinfo(MS_contact_email).name == "contact email");
00051     unit_assert(cvinfo(MS_contact_email).def == "Email adress of the contact person.");
00052 
00053     unit_assert(cvinfo(MS_zlib_compression).parentsIsA.size() == 1 &&
00054                 cvinfo(MS_zlib_compression).parentsIsA[0] == MS_binary_data_compression_type);
00055 
00056     unit_assert(cvinfo(MS_instrument_model).parentsPartOf.size() == 1 &&
00057                 cvinfo(MS_instrument_model).parentsPartOf[0] == MS_instrument);
00058 }
00059 
00060 
00061 void testIsA()
00062 {
00063     unit_assert(cvIsA(MS_dalton, MS_mass_unit));
00064     unit_assert(cvIsA(MS_mass_unit, MS_unit));
00065     unit_assert(cvIsA(MS_dalton, MS_unit));
00066     unit_assert(!cvIsA(MS_dalton, MS_energy_unit));
00067     unit_assert(cvIsA(MS_m_z, MS_m_z));
00068     unit_assert(cvIsA(MS_FT_ICR, MS_mass_analyzer_type));
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00072 void testSynonyms()
00073 {
00074     const CVInfo& info = cvinfo(MS_B);
00075     unit_assert(info.name == "magnetic field strength");
00076     unit_assert(info.exactSynonyms.size() == 1);
00077     unit_assert(info.exactSynonyms[0] == "B");
00078     unit_assert(cvinfo(MS_QIT).exactSynonyms.size() == 3);
00079 
00080     unit_assert(cvinfo(MS_chemical_ionization).shortName() == "CI");
00081     unit_assert(cvinfo(MS_FT_ICR).shortName() == "FT_ICR");
00082     unit_assert(cvinfo(MS_fourier_transform_ion_cyclotron_resonance_mass_spectrometer).shortName() == "FT_ICR");
00083     unit_assert(cvinfo(CVID_Unknown).shortName() == "Unknown");
00084 }
00085 
00086 
00087 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00088 {
00089     if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout; 
00090 
00091     try
00092     {
00093         test();
00094         testIsA();
00095         testSynonyms();
00096         return 0;
00097     }
00098     catch (exception& e)
00099     {
00100         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00101     }
00102     catch (...)
00103     {
00104         cerr << "Caught unknown exception.\n";
00105     }
00106 
00107     return 1; 
00108 }
